opponent.label: Dunban
opponent.artist: MyMainAccIsANord (Model, Posing) , Bulletshock (Clothing Assistance), Zeuses Swan Song (Model Assistance)
opponent.description: A high-ranking soldier of Colony 9, Dunban was originally throught to be the only one capable of wielding a legendary weapon - the Monado - and used it at the battle of Sword Valley, costing him the use of his right arm. He earned the nickname "Hero of the Homs", and became a legend throughout the world of the Bionis for his effort.
